column6: Crossbones and the Red Skull's daughter, Sin, have come to the American Midwest to tear a new hole in A.I.M., but none of them counted on Cap and S.H.I.E.L.D. Agent 13 stumbling into the mix, and everything going wrong.
column7: | Captain America | Crossbones | Sharon Carter | Sin
column8: | writer:Ed Brubaker | colorist:Frank D'Armata | penciller (cover):Steve Epting | letterer:Randy Gentile | penciller:Mike Perkins
